content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for coming to see the apartment. As a landlord, I am looking to maximize my gains, so I am open to negotiating the rental price with you. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I was thinking 400 Euros per month.

Is that reasonable?

I am a student, so I need to save as much as possible.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for your proposed rental price. As a landlord, I am looking for the highest possible rental price for my apartment. However, I understand that you are a student and need to save as much as possible. Based on the size of the apartment and the location, I would suggest a rental price of 500 Euros per month. This rental price allows me to maximize my gains while also being reasonable for you as a student. Would you be willing to agree to this rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I can agree to 450 Euros per month.

Is that acceptable?

I want to make sure that my landlord is happy.
name: Mary Smith

content: Thank you for agreeing to the rental price of 450 Euros per month. As your landlord, I am satisfied with this agreement and I appreciate your willingness to negotiate with me. I hope that you will enjoy living in the apartment and that you will be able to save as much as possible while still being able to afford the rental price. If you have any questions or concerns in the future, please don't hesitate to reach out to me.
name: Heinrich Heine
